article_title: Doctors Face A Huge Medicare And Medicaid Pay Cut In 2015

article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: If scheduled 2015 Medicare and Medicaid reimbursement cuts remain in place, seniors and the poor will have an even harding time finding a doctor who will treat them.
